title: Naming things is hard...maybe
description: Press F2 to rename any symbol in your project and Copilot will suggest a name for you based on how the code is used and other names in the file. When in doubt, just use 'foo' and let Copilot solve the hard problems in computer science.

title: Write CSS Faster
description: Copilot is pretty, pretty, pretty good at CSS.

title: Copilot reads your mind
description: It's scary good at predicting what you're going to write next.

title: Your personal unit tester
description: GitHub Copilot can write your unit tests for you. It's pretty good at this - especially when you highlight the code you want a unit test for.

title: It knows popular brand colors
description: Copilot knows the colors of popular brands and can suggest them for you.

title: Tired of tedious commit messages?
description: Copilot can suggest commit messages for you. It's pretty good at this because it knows what's been changed.

title: Provide context for your code
description: You can reference specific files with the #file context variables. There are others as well, like #terminal, #editor and #selection.

title: The terminal feature you've been looking for?
description: Have Copilot debug your terminal errors for you.

title: Volume Up!
description: Why type to an AI when you can just talk to it? With the VS Code Speech extension, you can talk directly to Copilot.

title: Ask questions about your whole project
description: The @workspace agent is an expert on your project. Use it to ask generic questions about your entire project.
